name: A worn suit of orcish battlearmour
data: It increases the users strength like a god.
It increases the users dexterity like a god.
It increases the users constitution impressively.
It decreases the users wisdom poorly.
It decreases the users intelligence poorly.
It has excellent armour class for its type (magnificent in general).
It decreases the users spellpoint regeneration pitifully.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration like a god.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
